alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 1:01PM CDT until May 24 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 100 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Grove Hill, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Grove Hill and Fulton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
